1.Name: Boring Burst
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Enters the driving state and charges enemies, launching a drilling attack upon hit and dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

1.Name: Drill Team Mobilization
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are 2 or more <color=#FFFFFF>Belobog Heavy Industries</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> DMG increases by 20%. If the target is <color=#FF5521>Burning</color> or <color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</color>, this buff increases by an additional 20%.

2.Name: Drill Team Mobilization
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are 2 or more <color=#FFFFFF>Belobog Heavy Industries</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> DMG increases by 25%. If the target is <color=#FF5521>Burning</color> or <color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</color>, this buff increases by an additional 25%.
